long_description: The ultralight Scout UL2 is a 3-season, single-wall backpacking tent that uses 2 trekking poles (sold separately) to set up the tent. Carry less than a pound per person for a fully waterproof shelter. Scout features 1 large, easy-entry front door and no vestibule. Set up the tent with 1 trekking pole on the inside at the back end and 1 on the outside at the door. Single wall design has front and rear vents to keep air circulating inside the tent; vents are lined with polyester mesh to keep the bugs out. Reflective guyline and webbing at tent corners, and at suggested anchor points, enhance nighttime visibility. Silicone treated ripstop nylon with waterproof polyurethane coating is durable and lightweight. All seams are taped with waterproof, solvent-free polyurethane tape (no PVC or VOCs); waterproof door keeps tent dry. Big Agnes Scout UL2 tent feaures 2 built-in, bin-shaped storage shelves and gear loft loops (gear loft not included). Includes stuff sacks and 12 superlight aluminum J-stakes.
short_description: The ultralight Scout UL2 is a 3-season, single-wall backpacking tent that uses 2 trekking poles (sold separately) to set up the tent. Carry less than a pound per person for a fully waterproof shelter.
